title: First fashion
description: One page responsive application, showcasing the homepage of a fashion retailer. Allows users to add featured products to the basket, it calculates the total price and allows a promotional code to be entered. Try 'SHOEOVER75' with a pair of shoes and a basket value over Â£75.
technologies: HTML5, CSS3, Javascript, AngularJS (controllers, partials, services, factories, resources, routes & mocks), Karma, Protractor and Bootstrap.

title: atlantic
description: Responsive multiple page application showcasing a design, shopfit and print company.
technologies: HTML5, CSS3, Javascript, AngularJS (controllers, partials, factories, resources, routes & mocks) and Bootstrap.

title: Taste
description: Application with user login, logged in users can create, edit and delte restaurant and comments.
technologies: Ruby, HTML5, CSS3, Rails - MVC, Devise, facebook omniauth, PostgreSQL, AWS, Rspec and Capybara.

title: Github User Search
description: Application which allows users to seach for GitHub profiles.
technologies: Javascript, HTML5, CSS3, AngularJS (controllers, factories, resources, mocks and routes), Jasmine, Karma Protractor and two API calls to GitHub.
